name: Grow (itch) (Kohan)
description:
Catch water drops to help your plant grow. Don't miss any of them or they will make thorns grow over your plant.

Use LMB to catch falling water drops.

Use WASD or arrow keys to jump horizontally/vertically between leaves.

If water drop falls all the way down the thorns will advance. If they advance too far they will kill the frog.

There is a lot of things I wanted to add but I haven't due to lack of time(had to learn for thesis defence c:) - but I'm just glad that I was able to finish the game, because I often leave projects unfinished. Hope you will enjoy this short game and I would love to receive feedback.
